instance_reference.name: animator_attachments
instance_reference.comment: Child EBPs should probably not override this. The territory sector layout ext handles the visuals for the entity, since they swap dynamically based on wall connections. So, they don't need anything beside their base layout from the entity blueprint ext

float.name: ui_range_radius
float.comment: 10 is the setting for deep strike radius, if this number need to be changed, then deep strike radius needs to request programming support
